data.title: TWO-STEP TO IT!
data.meta_description: Mark Hill hopes to have the Yanks two-stepping like mad by the end of the year...
data.text:
ARTFUL DODGER‘s MARK HILL is to tour the US in an attempt to break two-step in the American market

As revealed on NME.COM in July, the duo Artful Dodger have split, with Hill retaining the garage duo’s name.

Now, according to www.sonicnet.com, Hill will promote the last Artful Dodger album ‘It’s All About the Stragglers’ with an eight-city tour of North America in the autumn.

Hill will perform DJ sets at the shows, while the album will see a US release on September 18.

Advertisement

Artful Dodger appears at: Greensboro Electric Mayhem (September 24)

New York TBA (26)
